blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

MINORS DO NOT INTERACT. YOU WILL GET BLOCKED.

funyundere/tawneybelvedere's backup account for horror imagines/reader-insert smut. I also write for dark fantasy, dark comedy, monsters, Halloween media, murder mysteries, and villains in general. Make sure to blacklist any tags that make you uncomfortable.

Queue is set up so there's one new imagine a day. Posts that are aren't imagines, asks, etc. are tagged “Tawney talks”. Side blog is thedinnertawbel. Twitter and Wattpad is @derehart.

♥️REQUESTS ARE OPEN♥️

tags: the list of applicable media is endless
summary: Fun reminder @ internet; idc if you were a minor at the time the book/movie/game/etc came out;... idc if they are played by an...
body:
Fun reminder @ internet; idc if you were a minor at the time the book/movie/game/etc came out;… idc if they are played by an adult and only playing a kid… if you’re lusting after underage characters, real or animated… and are an adult now, then you’re disgusting and you need to stop.

Stop fetishizing children. Let fan communities be safe for minors. Saying “it’s just fiction” only furthers a belief that it’s okay. It allows the boundaries to be twisted and distorted by those who would use it to manipulate and exploit minors.

How we respond to fiction and media directly affects how we see and interact with the real world. So fucking stop.

summary: If Spider-Man were to be included in Kingdom Hearts, which version would you A. most prefer, B. think would work best, C....
question: If Spider-Man were to be included in Kingdom Hearts, which version would you A. most prefer, B. think would work best, C. believe to be most likely? It's not like there's a lack of options, between Film, animation, and comic continuities.
answer: I’m expecting something like the MCU in Kingdom Hearts IV (Star Wars’ll be held back for awhile, I think, but I imagine Marvel’s in the reasonably near future), and hope that whether it’s that or something closer to the comics they get Josh Keaton to voice Spidey. However, what I also think is likely, and would VERY much like to see, is if it was Insomniac’s Spider-Man who made the scene. That was obviously a huge hit, creative director Bryan Inhitar mentioned his love for the series and that he’d love a crossover with their version of Spider-Man, and my understanding is that Marvel would like to consolidate their video game stuff into something like a shared universe so having this Spider-Man be the one to show up elsewhere would fit with that. And of course, his and Sora’s selfie games are on point.

reblog.comment: I’m expecting something like the MCU in Kingdom Hearts IV (Star Wars’ll be held back for awhile, I think, but I imagine Marvel’s in the reasonably near future), and hope that whether it’s that or something closer to the comics they get Josh Keaton to voice Spidey. However, what I also think is likely, and would VERY much like to see, is if it was Insomniac’s Spider-Man who made the scene. That was obviously a huge hit, creative director Bryan Inhitar mentioned his love for the series and that he’d love a crossover with their version of Spider-Man, and my understanding is that Marvel would like to consolidate their video game stuff into something like a shared universe so having this Spider-Man be the one to show up elsewhere would fit with that. And of course, his and Sora’s selfie games are on point.

trail.content_raw: I’m expecting something like the MCU in Kingdom Hearts IV (Star Wars’ll be held back for awhile, I think, but I imagine Marvel’s in the reasonably near future), and hope that whether it’s that or something closer to the comics they get Josh Keaton to voice Spidey. However, what I also think is likely, and would VERY much like to see, is if it was Insomniac’s Spider-Man who made the scene. That was obviously a huge hit, creative director Bryan Inhitar mentioned his love for the series and that he’d love a crossover with their version of Spider-Man, and my understanding is that Marvel would like to consolidate their video game stuff into something like a shared universe so having this Spider-Man be the one to show up elsewhere would fit with that. And of course, his and Sora’s selfie games are on point.
trail.content: I’m expecting something like the MCU in Kingdom Hearts IV (Star Wars’ll be held back for awhile, I think, but I imagine Marvel’s in the reasonably near future), and hope that whether it’s that or something closer to the comics they get Josh Keaton to voice Spidey. However, what I also think is likely, and would VERY much like to see, is if it was Insomniac’s Spider-Man who made the scene. That was obviously a huge hit, creative director Bryan Inhitar mentioned his love for the series and that he’d love a crossover with their version of Spider-Man, and my understanding is that Marvel would like to consolidate their video game stuff into something like a shared universe so having this Spider-Man be the one to show up elsewhere would fit with that. And of course, his and Sora’s selfie games are on point.
